title: Cabina.AI
description:
All-in-One AI platform:
- Shared context via different LLMs: change AI & keep the context of the conversation
- Compare mode: one prompt - 2X results from different LLM
- Customizable Agent roles
- Actions: get ready-use AI commands with high-quality results
- AI Chat with: txt, doc, pdf, tables, video, audio
- TOP AI under one roof: pay less - get more
- ChatGPT, Gemini, Flux1, Claude, Ideogram, Leonardo, LLAMA, Mistral, DALLE, Stable Diffusion in one window
- Chat Folders

Promocode: PRDHNT24
